sourceMeaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>tree</radical> with a <radical>squid</radical> on it, so you get closer to <kanji>examine</kanji> it.
meaningInfo: As you examine the tree and the squid in it, you think, "Huh, nope still weird." You should examine it further to find out what's going on.
readingMnemonic: You're sticking your face in really, really close to <kanji>examine</kanji> this little squid in the tree when <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai appears behind you. "There you are, squid! Thank you citizen, I've been looking all over for my little chum."
readingInfo: Imagine how many trees Ken examined before he found you both. Picture him putting his face really close to each one, then shedding a single tear when he realized this squid wasn't in it.
